member.name: T:TPDocWeb.Controllers.WikiController
member.summary: Main controller for the wiki visualization of the project documentation. Uses files from azure storage blob to render the menu system and all manually and autogenerated content within the documentation. Uses Azure TableStore to index pages for the search function.

member.summary: Blob keys for template files

member.summary: Blob key to the HTML file that represents the thumbnails on the index site

member.summary: Blob key to the HTML file that represents the guidelines on the edit page

member.returns: Whether or not a blob should be included

The link you are redirected too when clicking the thumb title
The text of the title itself
The body text of the thumb
The HTML id of the upper column element for the current thumb

member.name: M:TPDocWeb.Controllers.WikiController.GetEditThumbnailHTML(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds the HTML that gives the user the ability to edit a thumbnail. The HTML returned from this method is switched with the HTML of the thumbnail element the user wishes to edit.
member.param: Link to the image file to use as a thumb image
The link you are redirected too when clicking the thumb title
The text of the title itself
The body text of the thumb

member.name: M:TPDocWeb.Controllers.WikiController.GetCreateThumbnailHTML(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds the HTML that gives the user the ability to create a new thumbnail. The HTML returned from this method is appended to the last cell of the thumbnail grid and is replaced by the new thumb when the user clicks save and the page reloads. Uses generate all the HTML except the top column level, which is only needed when creating new thumbs.
member.param: Link to the image file to use as a thumb image
The link you are redirected too when clicking the thumb title
The text of the title itself
The body text of the thumb
member.returns: Edit box HTML for a thumbnail

member.summary: Adds a thumnail to the blob using the method to generate the new thumbnail.
member.param: Link to the image file to use as a thumb image
The link you are redirected too when clicking the thumb title
The text of the title itself
The body text of the thumb

member.summary: Method used to render all documentation that require a manual part and an auto-genrated part. Uses a set of if-else statements to decide which paramaters to send to each view, and which view to use.

member.name: M:TPDocWeb.Controllers.WikiController.Swagger
